channel.title: [508] ReD-DdS [508]
channel.description:
[center]Hello, this is only my second source i made, and i am not a good coder, so don't post bad things.
This is a Blue-dds source, so all credits to him, only like 10% to me for editing a bit.
Here are some pics: [img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/4563/zgs.png[/img]
[img]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/7800/veng.png[/img]
[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/6692/sgsi.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Green is safe/Red is danger(pvp)[/size] [img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/5578/pvpsafe.png[/img]
[img]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/562/pvphot.png[/img]
[img]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/3623/iceblitza.png[/img]
[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/i/dbow.png/[/img]
[img]http://img705.imageshack.us/i/bgs.png/[/img]
[img]http://img175.imageshack.us/i/barrage.png/[/img]
[img]http://img186.imageshack.us/i/agsk.png/[/img]
Commands :
::male/::female ::lunar - veng runes + lunar magicks ::ancients - barrage runes + ancient magicks ::lol - max cash ::pvp - pking (1v1) ::normal - spawn point ::multi - new multi zone ( altar works ) ::startpack - for some fast pking gear ::hybrid - for fc'ing ::sellall - to sell inv ::npc <id> - to spawn an npc And some more commands, i just can't remember all.
MediaFire link ------> http://www.mediafire.com/?m2wnnkytjz2 UppIt link ---------> http://uppit.com/v/ODQMJNG2 MegaUpload link---> http://www.megaupload.com/?d=HAZN6X72
Feel free to leech, cause i didn't make it, zach did. I hope u like it, and could u rep me? :D
[/center]

@arturspkscape wrote:

[center]Hello, this is only my second source i made, and i am not a good coder, so don’t post bad things.

This is a Blue-dds source, so all credits to him, only like 10% to me for editing a bit.

Here are some pics:

[size=10pt]Green is safe/Red is danger(pvp)[/size]

Commands :

::male/::female
::lunar - veng runes + lunar magicks
::ancients - barrage runes + ancient magicks
::lol - max cash
::pvp - pking (1v1)
::normal - spawn point
::multi - new multi zone ( altar works )
::startpack - for some fast pking gear
::hybrid - for fc’ing
::sellall - to sell inv
::npc - to spawn an npc
And some more commands, i just can’t remember all.
